Author: Iscariiot
Text: I feel this. My Dietician sister was like “You look [10lbs more than my real weight]. Don’t lose anymore or you’ll be underweight.” And I’m like “Are you calling me fat???” (I’m quite UW)  You’re valid OP. Your disorder and status as UW is valid. Please don’t let someone else tell you that you look healthy when you’re not. I hope you feel better soon 💜
